minidraw.standard
Class SelectionTool

java.lang.Object
  minidraw.standard.AbstractTool
      minidraw.standard.SelectionTool
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tool
public class SelectionTool
extends AbstractTool
implements Tool

Selection tool: Uses a internal state pattern to define what type of tool to use in the current situation. Henrik Bærbak Christensen 2006

Field Detail

fChild

protected Tool fChild
Subtool to delegate to. The selection tool is in itself a state tool that may be in one of several states given by the sub tool. Class Invariant: fChild tool is never null

cachedNullTool

protected Tool cachedNullTool
helper null tool to avoid creating and destroying objects all the time

draggedFigure

protected Figure draggedFigure
the figure that is being dragged. If null then its operation is not that of dragging a figure (or a set of figures)

selectionStrategy

RubberBandSelectionStrategy selectionStrategy
the rubber band selection strategy to use.

createDragTracker

protected Tool createDragTracker(Figure f)
Factory method to create a Drag tracker. It is used to drag a figure.

createAreaTracker

protected Tool createAreaTracker()
Factory method to create an Area Tracker. It is used to select an area.
